oshiSkill.name: ホワイトマイク
oshiSkill.description: [Once per turn] During this turn, your white center holomem gets Arts+20.

spOshiSkill.name: クイックガード
spOshiSkill.description: [Once per game] During your opponent's turn, usable if your white holomem would take Damage from your opponent:That holomem takes -20 Damage.

name: Amane Kanata
collabEffect: ホロサマー: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. Reveal 1 Debut holomem with #Summer from among them, and add the revealed card to hand. Then, return the remaining cards to the bottom of the deck in any order.

name: Amane Kanata
bloomEffect: 相談のるよ: Reveal 1 Debut holomem with #Gen4 from your deck, and add it to hand. Then, shuffle the deck.

skills.name: みんなのスパダリ
skills.description: This Arts gets +10 for each of your holomem with #Summer.

name: Amane Kanata
giftEffect: エンジェルウィンド : [Center position only] Your collab Debut holomem with #Gen4 gets Arts+40.

skills.name: きみの背中に追いつけるように
skills.description: [Once per turn] If your opponent's center holomem is downed by this Arts, deal 40 Special Damage to 1 of your opponent's 2nd holomem.

name: Himemori Luna
giftEffect: なんでも入る巾着: [Collab position only]If your holomem is downed during your opponent's turn, if you have equal or less Life than your opponent, your may return 1 item with "PC" in its name from your archive to hand.

name: Tokoyami Towa
collabEffect: 花火見ていく？: Deal 10 Special Damage to your opponent's center holomem. If you are going second and this is your first turn, deal 20 Special Damage instead.

skills.name: トワに見惚れちゃった？

name: Tsunomaki Watame
collabEffect: みんなと夏祭り: You may send 1 cheer from your archive to your 2nd holomem with #Gen4.

skills.name: わたあめおいしいねぇ
